mapper.select: select board_id, title, b_writer, b_date, likes from boards
select board_id, title, b_writer, b_date, likes from boards where boards.b_writer = #{b_writer}
select board_id, title, b_writer, b_date, likes from boards where boards.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
select board_id, title, b_writer, b_date, likes from boards where boards.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or boards.b_writer = #{keyword}
select board_id, title, content, b_writer, writer_email, b_date, likes from boards where boards.board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into boards(title, content, b_writer, writer_email, b_date) value (#{title}, #{content}, #{b_writer}, #{writer_email}, #{b_date})
mapper.update: update boards set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, b_date = #{b_date} where boards.board_id = #{board_id}
update boards set likes = #{likes} where boards.board_id = #{board_id}
